mapper.select: select c.crtusr, c.usrguid, c.followoption, c.guid, c.docguid, to_char(c.FOLLOWDATETIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi') as FOLLOWDATETIME from chis_followup_plan c where c.status = '1' and c.DOCGUID=#{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.USRGUID=#{1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FOLLOWDATETIME>=to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') order by FOLLOWDATETIME desc

select name, case when length(idcard)=18 then decode(mod (to_number( substr(idcard ,17, 1)),2 ),0, '2','1' ) when length(idcard)=15 then decode(mod(to_number(idcard),2),0,'2','1') end as sex, case when length(idcard)=18 then ceil((to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')-to_char(to_date(substr(idcard,7,8),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd'))/10000) when length(idcard)=15 then ceil((to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')-to_char(to_date('19'||substr(idcard,7,6),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd'))/10000) end as age, ID as telPhone
from usr where guid= #{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and org='CHIS'

select b.name ,decode(mod (to_number( substr(b.idcard ,17, 1)),2 ),0, '2','1' ) as sex ,b.guid usrguid , b.imgguid, case when length(b.idcard)=18 then ceil((to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')-to_char(to_date(substr(b.idcard,7,8),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd'))/10000) when length(b.idcard)=15 then ceil((to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')-to_char(to_date('19'||substr(b.idcard,7,6),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd'))/10000) end as age, a.ZDNAM ZHAND , to_char(a.crtdat,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') crtdat, c.followoption ,c.guid , to_char(c.followdatetime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') followdatetime, c.followstate from CHIS_followup_Plan c, usr b, SICKBLHDR a where c.docguid = #{docguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.usrguid = b.guid and c.sicguid = a.guid
and c.FOLLOWDATETIME between to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and c.status=1
and b.name like '${'%' + name + '%'}'
order by c.crtdat desc

select b.name ,decode(mod (to_number( substr(b.idcard ,17, 1)),2 ),0, '2','1' ) as sex ,b.guid usrguid , b.imgguid, case when length(b.idcard)=18 then ceil((to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')-to_char(to_date(substr(b.idcard,7,8),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd'))/10000) when length(b.idcard)=15 then ceil((to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')-to_char(to_date('19'||substr(b.idcard,7,6),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd'))/10000) end as age, a.ZDNAM ZHAND , to_char(a.crtdat,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') crtdat, c.followoption ,c.guid ,c.sicguid, to_char(c.followdatetime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') followdatetime, c.followstate from CHIS_followup_Plan c, usr b, SICKBLHDR a where c.docguid = #{docguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.usrguid = b.guid and c.sicguid = a.guid
and c.FOLLOWDATETIME between to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and c.status=1 and c.FOLLOWSTATE in ('1','2')
and b.name like '${'%' + name + '%'}'
order by c.followdatetime desc

select b.name ,decode(mod (to_number( substr(b.idcard ,17, 1)),2 ),0, '2','1' ) as sex ,b.guid usrguid , b.imgguid, case when length(b.idcard)=18 then ceil((to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')-to_char(to_date(substr(b.idcard,7,8),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd'))/10000) when length(b.idcard)=15 then ceil((to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')-to_char(to_date('19'||substr(b.idcard,7,6),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd'))/10000) end as age, a.ZDNAM ZHAND , to_char(a.crtdat,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') crtdat, c.followoption ,c.guid ,c.sicguid, to_char(c.followdatetime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') followdatetime, c.followstate from CHIS_followup_Plan c, usr b, SICKBLHDR a where c.docguid = #{docguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.usrguid = b.guid and c.sicguid = a.guid and c.FOLLOWSTATE in ('3','4','5','6','7') and c.status=1
and b.name like '${'%' + name + '%'}'
order by c.followdatetime desc
